projects.title: Game Night Recommender
projects.description: Developed a novel personalized game recommendation system integrating Discord and Steam APIs, utilizing user preferences and social connections to suggest multiplayer games for group play.

projects.title: Snake Programming Language
projects.description: Designed a novel Python-inspired language with a tokenizer, evaluator, parser, and semantic analyzer, ensuring cross-platform compatibility on MacOS and Windows.

projects.title: Fetal Monitoring
projects.description: Engineered a patented cost-effective hardware prototype with audio processing for third-trimester fetal monitoring, achieving a 98% cost reduction compared to traditional ultrasound.

education.title: Master of Science, Software Engineering
education.description: Advanced my expertise in software engineering with a focus on practical and theoretical aspects of the software development life cycle, culminating in a transformative educational experience that honed my technical, collaborative and problem-solving skills.

highlights.description: Selected for the Innovation Showcase by the Managing Director for displaying "URGENCY & PERSISTENCE" in my work contributions during Covid-19.

Supported student learning as a Grading Specialist and Online Facilitator for a CSE course by assessing assignments, engaging in discussion forums, troubleshooting software, and holding weekly office hours for personalized guidance.
Established a new chapter of GDSC (Google Developer Student Clubs) at the Polytechnic campus to engage students interested in Google technology and Software Development with workshops and projects.

education.title: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science & Engineering
education.description: Where it all began ‚Äî a rigorous program that instilled a deep understanding of computer science fundamentals, programming, and system design, setting a solid foundation for my career.

highlights.description: Awarded the Prof. CNRRao Merit Seholarship for being in the top 20% performers in the CS Department.
Awarded the Prof. CNRRao Merit Seholarship for being in the top 20% performers in the CS Department.
Won the runner up place at the Cisco Hackathon where we developed a winner predicter system for the Indian Premiere League Cricket tournaments.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Led key initiatives such as API design and implementation, data migration, UI development, system transitions, API and process documentation, and on-boarding mentorship of new recruits, resulting in streamlined processes and increased operational efficiency.

highlights.description: Orchestrated 2 defect-free code releases through meticulous planning and execution, ensuring 100% on-time delivery and flawless production integration.
Mentored 3 new hires through personalized knowledge-transfer sessions, reducing onboarding time by 40%.

skills.overview: With a toolbox filled with advanced programming languages and technologies such as Java, Python, Angular, and React, coupled with deep expertise in cloud computing and data science, I am equipped to tackle complex software challenges. My approach is always guided by the latest in agile practices, continuous integration, and robust testing methodologies to ensure excellence in every project.
